name: Travelling Cappuccino
lyric:
Travelling Cappuccino
作词：Chet Lam
作曲：Chet Lam
演唱：林一峰
Stop the alarm on your way
Go with the flow walking stralght
It's just another hectic day
Stop the alarm on your way
In between you do things without knowing
Go with the flow walkking stralght
Missing every opportunity to brighten up you day
Slow down look around
You'd better take a look at what you're having
Coffee blace of brown
Tastes no diffence even if it's tailor-made
Watch out the man of your dream
Is gonna show up every second even if it's not
Travelling cappuccino be with you anyway
Travelling Cappuccino Travelling Cappuccino
Travelling Cappuccino be with you anyway

author.name: 虾米用户
author.motto: 願你我能留在黑暗中多一陣...

comments.brief: &quot;stop the alarm on your way / go with the flow walking straight&quot; 這首歌是很重要的提醒呢
